org.codehaus.groovy.grails.test.spock
[Groovy] Class IntegrationSpecConfigurerExtension

java.lang.Object
  org.spockframework.runtime.extension.AbstractAnnotationDrivenExtension
      org.codehaus.groovy.grails.test.spock.IntegrationSpecConfigurerExtension

@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class IntegrationSpecConfigurerExtension
extends org.spockframework.runtime.extension.AbstractAnnotationDrivenExtension

Spock extension that can be applied to Integration tests to make them Grails aware

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
2.3
